name: Stored Power
description: You use your psychic energy to attack with stored power. Make a ranged attack, dealing 1d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit. Add an additional damage dice for each stat-changing effect currently applied to the user. (For example, if you or an ally has activated a move(s) that is currently boosting the user's AC, speed, and STAB, add three additional damage dice. A move that affects multiple ability scores is considered "one" effect for this boost)
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works well if the user is pumped up.
